chapter.text: 106|2|fuyu to natsu no kare-ra no taishō no hogo no tame,(sono arrā no onmegumi no tame ni)
106|3|kare-ra ni, kono Sei-dono no omo ni tsukae saseyo.
106|4|Ue ni saishite wa, kare-ra ni shokumotsu o atae, mata osore ni saishite wa, sore o nozoki kokoro o yasuraka ni shite kudasaru okata ni.
